message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $13,000.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand you're looking for a deal. How about we meet in the middle at $11,250? This product truly is exceptional and will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
